divs: sighting detailsironic due 2 the fact i have had multiple sightings of strange lights in the sky in sunrise fl on multiple days and nights and one strange day sighting on jan18\13,but really staring back 2012 middle of the year.i wuz out in my back porch and observed a strange changing color red\blue\orange object in the north sky coloring then diapering,if u hold your arm out and put a penny in front of you thats about the size.this event took place around eightish to tenish not sure and lasted about 7to13minutes.did record it and wuz baffled. next event on dec20\2012 at about 940pm and this is when it gets strange because more sightings taking place almost weekly after this one, any ways,i wuz out back in porch again and after wittinessing the first event earlier that year, i sky watch any chance i get and on this date strange lights just appear, 7 then 4 in the north sky,when they appeared they were in a formation like a kite,thats when i wittinessed 7 of them and n that sequence the 2 middle light came together and formed one then separated back into the formation. the two conjoining then disjointing were reddish globe look, the others were orange globe look,i cuoldnt believe what i wuz seeing. i ran into the house to get my wife and when came out there where only 4 left, still in the kite position but missing the string which wuz the other three globes,they were bout golf ball size lights if put hand out with golf ball.recorded the last sequence. dec31\2012 11:45pm out back with my 16 year old son celebrating the new year and west of my house wuz the little changing red bright color light similar to the one i experienced the first time in the middle of last year.i told my son to look, he and i witneesed the start to an era of events that took place shortly after midnight into the new year of 2013. bout 1215am coming from the east to west wuz strange orange and reddish globe balls of light flying in formation. it wuz strange because when one would appear from the east going to the west and disappear then another light would appear in that same exact location then disappear were the last one disappeared.this event took place bout 5 minutes and witnessed in that sequence aproximatetly 7 to 10 strange lights.my son and i were ecstatic, i have video of it. four more sighting with video after these events just to much to explain. im a believer now.
Summary: Many strange light and sightings in the last few months in sth. Fl.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Sunrise
There were no other sightings in Sunrise on or around December 20th 2012
